The claim falsely accuses Sen: Kamala Harris of helping to raise money to free an accused child rapist.
Sen: Kamala Harris actually urged her Twitter followers to donate to the Minnesota Freedom Fund, a nonprofit organization that assists low-income individuals unable to pay bail.
The Minnesota Freedom Fund raised a sign: but only a small portion of that money was used to bail out protesters.
The Biden: Harris campaign supports ending cash bail and implementing a fair pretrial system that does not discriminate or bias against individuals based on their income.
